com.mapzen.tangram

Interface TouchInput.TapResponder

  • Enclosing class:
    TouchInput

    public static interface TouchInput.TapResponder
    Interface for responding to a tap gesture

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(float x, float y)
      Called after a touch is lifted and determined to not be part of a double tap The timeout duration for a double tap is determined by ViewConfiguration
      boolean onSingleTapUp(float x, float y)
      Called immediately after a touch is lifted in a tap gesture; may be part of a double tap

    • Method Detail

      • onSingleTapUp

        boolean onSingleTapUp(float x,
                    float y)
        Called immediately after a touch is lifted in a tap gesture; may be part of a double tap
        Parameters:
        x - The x screen coordinate of the tapped point
        y - The y screen coordinate of the tapped point
        Returns:
        True if the event is consumed, false if the event should continue to propagate

      • onSingleTapConfirmed

        boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(float x,
                           float y)
        Called after a touch is lifted and determined to not be part of a double tap The timeout duration for a double tap is determined by ViewConfiguration
        Parameters:
        x - The x screen coordinate of the tapped point
        y - The y screen coordinate of the tapped point
        Returns:
        True if the event is consumed, false if the event should continue to propagate
